extendedInfo.description: The Anywhere Map Freedom app is an innovative GPS technology for use for today's pilots. How do we know you'll love it? Because it's developed by pilots that love technology that use it every day when we fly too! How is this different than the other apps on the market? Because we offer more than just another pretty chart viewer--we offer you a real moving map GPS application with terrain and night views, as well as including the charts that everyone is offering. Our charts are ALWAYS geo-referenced--we never make you pay extra for that feature! For $49.99 you receive the Anywhere Map Freedom app with all of the geo-referenced US sectional and enroute charts as well as all of the US Approach Plates. The purchase includes a full year of updates to the map and chart data. Major features:  â¢	Track up or North upâ¢	Day mode or night modeâ¢	Approach plate on map and/or dedicated approach plateâ¢	Patented Cones of SafetyÂ®â¢	TAWS (Terrain Avoidance Warning System) graphicsâ¢	Vertical Navigation (VNAV) guidance  with target altitudes at waypoints â¢	Virtual Glideslope / Localizer to any runway endpointâ¢	Unlimited custom views allow for extensive map customizationAeronautical Digital Database features:â¢	Fixes, navaids, airports, private airportsâ¢	Victor airways including MEAsâ¢	Localizers and marker beaconsâ¢	Runway info including paved / unpaved and lightingâ¢	Radio frequencies including AWOSâ¢	Class B/C/D airspace boundariesâ¢	MOA / Restricted / Alert / Prohibited areasâ¢	SFR and TFR  graphical depiction Surface map featuresâ¢	100 meter Terrain elevation resolution â sharpest in the industryâ¢	TAWS warning or shaded terrain â¢	Highwaysâ¢	Radio towers and obstacles Geo-Referenced Graphical Chart Featuresâ¢	Seamless Sectional Chartsâ¢	Seamless Low Enroute Chartsâ¢	Approach Plates and Airport diagrams--can be over-laid on moving map screenâ¢	STARS, DPs, Minimums, and TERP Reference pages with page-flip buttons for multi-page documentsFind Nearby Functions:â¢	Nearby Airports / VORs / ATIS / AWOS / ATC / FSS frequenciesInternet based weather depictionsâ¢	Nexrad mosaic overlays on any viewâ¢	Graphical Metar Flagsâ¢	Terminal Forecasts â¢	NOAA weather graphic charts--Progs, Winds Aloft, Freezing LevelsFlight Planning & Route Creationâ¢	Drag and Drop on screen flight planningâ¢	Universal finder airport / waypoint search toolâ¢	Victor airway based route wizardâ¢	Flight plan screen with fuel usage calculationsâ¢	Winds Aloft compensation for better fuel consumption estimates and ETAâ¢	Unlimited Aircraft profiles includes fuel use, glide ratio, and weight and balanceâ¢	Unlimited User Waypoint entryâ¢	Track history / BreadcrumbsAlerts and reminders â Personal Digital CoPilotÂ®â¢	Switch Fuel tanks â¢	Check fuel pump â¢	Check Landing Gearâ¢	Begin Descent â¢	Check Oxygen â¢	Obstacle Ahead warningâ¢	Flight following â altitude and heading hold assistanceMap Screen Display and Formatting optionsâ¢	Compass Rose overlayâ¢	Graphical Metar Flags on mapâ¢	Day and night mode color schemesâ¢	Graphical depiction of grass runwaysâ¢	Knots / MPH quick togglesâ¢	Track / Bearing displayâ¢	ETE / ETA times to destination or next waypointâ¢	E-HSI  slaves to flight plan or the runway centerline â¢	Destination weather graphicPilot Tools:â¢	Flight Timer â only runs when aircraft is moving.â¢	Elapsed timer â¢	Winds aloft / TAS / Density altitude calculationsâ¢	Weight and balance calculatorâ¢	User customizable quick tools menuâ¢	Regional download controlsDevice must have a dual core processor and at least 512Mb of RAM.Anywhere Map Freedom is intended for use in North America, and includes US charts ONLY.

reviews.title: Does not work with RAZR MAXX HD - Terrible support
reviews.comment: I purchased this app and I have been unable to use it as it does not work with my device.  On boot up the screen is blue and nothing happens past that.  I have sent 3 emails to their support team over the past 3 months with no response.  The support link on their web page does not work anymore either.  I am very disappointed with their support, not to mention that it just will not work on my device.
reviews.author: Michael Andrus

reviews.title: Lots of bang for your buck
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Ive been using this for a year now and prior to that I was using the Anywhere Map Quadra. These GPS programs do everything the more expensive ones do but at a fraction of the cost. It is very easy and intuitive to use. I am very happy with it.
reviews.author: Isaac Faibisoff

reviews.title: Still doesn\'t work with nexus 10!!
reviews.comment: After startup, menu screen is too tiny to read, unable to use app, gets 1 star until fixed.
reviews.author: Danny Hetherwick

reviews.title: I dumped this one
reviews.comment: This app never lived up to its promised functions.  I am pleased with Avilition Maps.   JM
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Anywhere Map
reviews.comment: The app is OK but the Sectionals are not well defined, the Jacksonville & Miami sectionals have a blank spot (White), Not too good for aviation reference. I bought a subscription and it does not worth it.
reviews.author: Pablo L Torres

reviews.title: Getting there
reviews.comment: ASUS TF700T... Getting there, no updates in quite a while, I hope they don\'t give up on this app, has potential. Still a bit clunky interface, and the downloads take forever (please add background downloads for charts, etc.  My tablet is useless for anything else while downloading, I need to keep the app in the foreground, and not allow the screen to turn off, or lock, both of which are a pain, especially considering the length of time the downloads take...)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting worse again ...
reviews.comment: Nexrad weather data does not download anymore. Fuel prices outdated. You still can not see the expiration date on the IFR approach plates. For some reason they cut off this important part of the official plate!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Data Backup Needed
reviews.comment: Moving data is nice but I need to backup data for restore in the event of an SD Card failure.  I had this happen and 6 GB of data is too difficult to download just before a flight or on a stop-over! Look forward to the other features to be enabled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Might Never be Finished
reviews.comment: Could be a great product - if they would finish it. But, vendor has suspended development with no commitment on when it might continue. Many features unimplemented / don\342\200\231t work. Definitely no support for XM or ADS-B down link weather. Caveat Emptor.  ---------------------------------------------------------------  Five months after my first review. Still no XM / ADS-B. No new features. No bug fixes. Database and chart updates broken. Appears to be totally abandoned by the developer. Can I give it zero stars?
reviews.author: Greg Valvo

reviews.title: Good app solid
reviews.comment: Good solid app needs rubberbanding\'\'the only reason it gets a 4 star and not a 5 is because its 50 bucks
reviews.author: Daniel B

reviews.title: No go on nexus 10.
reviews.comment: Lots of potential, but missing low level enroutes and terrain data for Alaska (north of 60th parallel)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.0.112
reviews.comment: I have the Samsung Galaxy S3 with OS 4.1.1 and I also can not open the program.  I get the exact same blue screen and nothing more.  I really wish this App would work as it is very good when working.
reviews.author: Ken Smith

reviews.title: Works as designed
reviews.comment: I\'ve been an AWM user for about 10 yrs. Great app. A fist full of power for $79. Flew me on a trip on tuesday. I look for to getting the BT to couple to my AP. Still like it. Looking forward to the refinements.
reviews.author: Patrick Hildebrand

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work On Nexus 10
reviews.comment: It is truly sad that this software doesn\'t work. I\'ve tried to give these guys every bit of slack I can but they just keep producing flops. If they were a student pilot I would have to give them that talk about how flying isn\'t really in their future...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed Longtime User
reviews.comment: I am very disappointed that Control Vision has given up on Anywhere Map. It has such great potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love This on my Galaxy SIII
reviews.comment: Warning !,   No longer works with Galaxy SIII    I have used AWM before and find this works quite well on my Galaxy SIII, The GSIII has a large screen and finger zoom so getting detail in flight was not hard to do, It was very accurate. Has everything you need to get from point a to b ! , I like that it remembered my previous settings, so I just open the App and I am ready to go. !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well... For the most part
reviews.comment: Provides all the information needed for navigating around. However one big issue I have is that there is no Canadian data. It would be great if anywhere map provided this info sooner than later. Other than that works great as a moving map GPS.
reviews.author: Carlos M

reviews.title: No-go on Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Galaxy S3.  Update 1.0.112 says greatly improved compatibility.  All I get is a blue screen with a loading bar followed by a blue screen without a loading bar.
reviews.author: Matt Crandall

reviews.title: I trusted anywhere map :(
reviews.comment: Using a common Motorola RAZR phone. The app doesn\'t work at all very disappointed I\'ve owned other anywhere map products and was always happy I guess I just wasted 50 bucks
reviews.author: Mike Gatewood

reviews.title: Dont bother for Alaska
reviews.comment: May be a decent app.  Sectionals are nice.  The interface is not intuative to a 10yr Garmin user.  Biggest problem is there is apparently no terrain data for Alaska, and it gets confused by the P instead of K in the airport identifier.  I cant just plug in PAFA for Fairbanks and flight plan for it.  Glad i got it for the 49.99 special price instead of full price.  It took too long to download the data to know I would not have all the features to retun it.
reviews.author: A Google User
